body:
Hi!


Ole Lemming wrote:


> What about the 3ds->ConRad->Rad conversion ? ;-)


The problem with 3ds is that it will triangulate
EVERYTHING - and only the windows-version of formZ
has an 3ds-export.


CU, Lars.
